 The lights go down 
 Time to go home 
 I face the night 
 All alone 
 Love Me Just A Little 
 Hold me in the darkness 
 The night can be so lonely 
 Love Me Just A Little 
 
 Lying here 
 Safe in your arms 
 I feel alright 
 I'll be strong 
 Love Me Just A Little 
 Hold me in the darkness 
 The night can be so lonely 
 Love Me Just A Little 
 
 The morning sun! 
 It's another day! 
 Another day!

 Jim Colyer ascap
Is this a poem or a song?! Either way I like it!emoticon_xagree

It is a song. I was working with a singer named Veda Radanovich in Printers Alley in Nashville. One night at the end of her show, she was tired and asked the audience, "Do you love me just a little?" I went home and wrote the song.
 Thanks,
 Jim
